dashaka thunakata pamana pasu prathama warata yapanaya ardhadwipaye wesak ulela athi uthkarshawath andamin pawathwimata katayuthu yoda athi bawa yapanaya aarakshaka sena mulasthanaya sandahan karayi. 30 da dakwa eya pawathwe.me anuwa yapanaya kotuwa, pusthakalaya ha dureyiappa kridanganaya aawaranaya wana paridi wesak kalapayak nirmanaya kirimata yapanaya aarakshaka sena mulasthanaya katayuthu yoda atha.darshaniya wesak thorana wishala pahan kudu tharanga dansal bhakthi githa sandarshana aadi anga rasak athulath wiwidha wadasatahan mita adala we.uthure ha dakune janathawa athara jathika samagiya ha anyonaya sahayogithawa wardhanaya kirime aramunin me wesak kalapaya sanwidhanaya kara athi athara yapanaye padinchi aya ha dakune sancharakayanwenuwen wesak kalapaya wiwrutha bawa yuda hamudawa sandahan karayi.
